price: 37. Dan sungguh, mereka (setan-setan) benar-benar  menghalang-halangi mereka dari jalan yang benar, sedang mereka menyangka bahwa mereka mendapat petunjuk.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahum layaṣuddūnahum ʿani al-sabīli wayaḥsabūna annahum muh'tadūna
